price: 73. Annaga (Alle ah) baa waxaynu ka dhignay xusuus; iyo waxay ku intifaacaan kuwa ku safra saxraha (iyo qeyrkoodba)6.
footnotes: 6. Musaafiriinta ama socotada waxaa halkan loogu xusay gaar ahaan inuu arrinkaasi mudnaan gaar ah u leeyahay iyaga, inkastoo uu yahay sahay ay u baahan yihiin dadka guud ahaan. Dabkana waxaa lagu xusuustaa Naarta Aakhiro.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

translations: for the wayfarers in the desert
